19dd87f9-46f4-464a-9221-22f6cbb576d2.description: Successfully completed all steps of the WCC Change Management Bronze Certification including: Change Management 101 Module (3 short videos), 1 LinkedIn learning module, Change Management Handbook Review, Reflection Activity and a meeting with the individual's manager.
19dd87f9-46f4-464a-9221-22f6cbb576d2.name: WCC Change Management Bronze Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Change Management Bronze Certification consists of the following steps needed to be fully completed in order to receive your badge: Change Management 101 Module (3 short videos); "Change Management Foundations" LinkedIn Learning Module; Change Management Handbook Review; Reflection Activity; A Meeting with your Manager

07d2bd30-54a3-4397-b04d-f6cb05be96cf.description: Successfully completed all steps of the WCC Change Management Silver Certification including: a LinkedIn Learning Module on "Communicating in times of change", an Article on "Overcoming resistance to change within your organization" , introduction of Change@BMS Workshop (Methodology & Levers, The Human response to change and Sponsor Activation), a quick Knowledge Check and a meeting with the individual's manager
07d2bd30-54a3-4397-b04d-f6cb05be96cf.name: WCC Change Management Silver Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Change Management Silver Certification consists of the following steps needed to be fully completed in order to receive your badge: "Communicating in times of change" LinkedIn Learning Module"; Overcoming resistance to change within your organization" Article; Change@BMS Introduction (Methodology & Levers, The Human response to change and Sponsor Activation); Quick Knowledge Check; Meeting with your Manager
